data.title: Famous Birthdays on April 16
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 16th of April. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on April 16.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 280

Louis the Pious

and the Debonaire), Holy Roman Emperor (814-840), born in Cassinogilum, Aquitaine
